title: Forecast Janna LVL 6&7 emote hidden behind health bar

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: {{champion:40}}  Help me rito fix this , this is so annoying cause i like spamming emotes like everyone else

replies.body: Thanks for the report! We're noticing this occurring with several champions and skins, and are working to make it so everyone can flash their mastery in clear view. :)
